welcome_message_body: Welcome to Kamisu, Japan! Get ready to experience the charm of this coastal city, known for its beautiful beaches, rich history, and delicious local cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Kamisu has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main international terminal at Narita International Airport, serving a wide range of airlines and destinations.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The secondary international terminal at Narita International Airport, primarily serving budget airlines and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Narita International Airport, dedicated to low-cost carriers and domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but it may require periodic reconnection.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ibaraki Airport houses all necessary facilities for travelers, including check-in counters, baggage claim, and departure gates.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. No password is required.
